clearTextFields(MouseEvent) - Method in class application.Home_BrowseController
MouseEvent action event detector, that clears all the text fields when any text field is clicked this forces the user to only be able to enter one single search term at a time instead of dealing with that myself

CreateController - Class in application
The CreateController class, represents the Create new recipe view, and connects UI with back end and implements EventHandler to get action events from JavaFX and Initializable to switch scenes and update certain models.
